string.text: Stalker, have you had mutant meat? I know it's not that great, but I've got some contacts on the outside who will pay a pretty penny for some salted, seasoned mutant jerky. The more exotic, the better, eh? So if you bring me meat, I'll be sure to keep you supplied with the means to keep bringing in meat, if you know what I mean.
Thanks, stalker. I've got enough of this type for now.
You don't look like you're equipped to hunt. I have a spare hunting knife - prove to me you're at least capable of killing a Flesh or something and it's yours.

Are you really trying to hunt with that thing? You're going to end up wasting ammo just to bring down a pig! A hunter can't really hunt effectively without a good rifle, so, bring me the pelt of a boar and I'll give you a good rifle.

I can always use some good food to eat. I can't leave this place though, the hunters here rely on me for supplies. Are you a half decent cook? Bring me some decent food and I'll give you this hunting pistol.
I have a spot missing in my trophy collection - a Chimera's hide, horns and claws. I trust if you can get it for me, I'll bequeath you my personal shotgun.
Excellent work! Here you go, use her well.
The diggers are having good luck finding artifacts, but not so much luck moving them around. Can you bring us some containers?
Looking to swap artifacts? You came to the right place.
